item.title: 10-4 Preview – Projected Lineup + Petersen expected, Clarke goes 5-for-5, Today’s Practice
item.description: 10-4 Preview – Projected Lineup + Petersen expected, Clarke goes 5-for-5, Today’s Practice Date Site Link 2022-10-04 [[LA Kings Insider]] 10-4 Preview – Projected Lineup + Petersen expected, Clarke goes 5-for-5, Today’s Practice Contributors: [[Zach Dooley]] Players [[Cal Petersen]] [[Brandt Clarke]] Summary The Kings and Ducks square off for the second time in three days, with the setting moving to Honda Center in Anaheim.

item.title: An enthusiastic Gabe Vilardi has made an impression on teammates and coaches in camp
item.description: An enthusiastic Gabe Vilardi has made an impression on teammates and coaches in camp Link Date Published Site An enthusiastic Gabe Vilardi has made an impression on teammates and coaches in camp 2022-10-05 [[LA Kings Insider]] Contributors: [[Zach Dooley]] Players [[Gabe Vilardi]] [[Trevor Moore]] [[Phillip Danault]] Staff [[Todd McLellan]] Summary It’s certainly been an impressive start to training camp for Gabe Vilardi.

item.title: Day 14 Primer – The Split
item.description: Day 14 Primer – The Split Date Site Link 2022-10-05 [[LA Kings Insider]] Day 14 Primer – The Split Contributors: [[Zach Dooley]] Players [[Quinton Byfield]] Summary The Kings group has been reduced to 34 skaters, though we’re seeing a group with fewer individuals truly in action with the Kings when factoring in injuries and illnesses.

item.title: Practice Notebook 10-5
item.description: Practice Notebook 10-5 Date Site Link 2022-10-05 [[LA Kings Insider]] Practice Notebook 10-5 Contributors: [[Zach Dooley]] Players [[Phillip Danault]] [[Trevor Moore]] [[Sean Durzi]] Summary Practice Notebook 10/5 – “Three Groups” of players, Durzi’s Progression, alternate jersey schedule Another day of practice here at Toyota Sports Performance Center as we approach Opening Night six days from today.

item.title: PRESEASON FINAL – Kings 4, Ducks 5 – Vilardi, Edler, McLellan
item.description: PRESEASON FINAL – Kings 4, Ducks 5 – Vilardi, Edler, McLellan Date Site Link 2022-10-04 [[LA Kings Insider]] PRESEASON FINAL – Kings 4, Ducks 5 – Vilardi, Edler, McLellan Contributors: [[Jared Shafran]] Players [[Gabe Vilardi]] [[Alex Edler]] [[Cal Petersen]] Summary The LA Kings had their highest offensive output of the preseason Tuesday night in Anaheim, but were unable to hold a pair of two-goal leads and came up short to the Ducks at the Honda Center, losing 5-4.

item.title: Taylor Ward feeling ready for first NHL training camp with fast start at Rookie Faceoff
item.description: Taylor Ward feeling ready for first NHL training camp with fast start at Rookie Faceoff Date Site Link 2022-09-19 [[LA Kings Insider]] Taylor Ward feeling ready for first NHL training camp with fast start at Rookie Faceoff Contributors: [[Jared Shafran]] Players [[Taylor Ward]] Summary Since making the decision to sign with the LA Kings last spring, Taylor Ward has done everything he can to familiarize himself with the organization.

item.title: Three days in, teammates and coaches weigh in on the exciting addition of Kevin Fiala
item.description: Three days in, teammates and coaches weigh in on the exciting addition of Kevin Fiala Link Date Published Site Three days in, teammates and coaches weigh in on the exciting addition of Kevin Fiala 2022-09-24 [[LA Kings Insider]] Contributors: Players Summary Notes
